heroText: Curated Thoughts on Code, Life, and Everything in Between.
addTitle: Add a title to your post...

About.title: What is Be Log?
About.content: If you're tired of living in an age where blog sites feel like a thing of the past, you're not alone. Welcome. This is a platform to take a breath in the middle of the digital noise, where everything is squeezed into 15-second videos. It’s a stop designed for those weary of algorithms deciding what we read, what we like, and how long we focus.
About.p2: The reason this site exists is to put thoughts into words without rushing, in a time when excessive consumption kills depth. This is a meeting point for anyone with a story to tell. There’s room for everything—from the kitchen of the tech world to small realizations in daily life, and from politics to pleasant moments we simply want to talk about. We take refuge in nostalgia not just because we love the past, but because we need a break from the pace of today.
About.footer: If you believe content is meant for reflection, not just 'consumption', you're in the right place. Our page is ready, our minds are clear.
